item.title: 中国最大金属集团呼吁限制铜产能
item.description: 中国主要金属协会表示，中国应考虑对国内铜、锌、铅产能设置上限，以应对残酷的国内竞争。【原文：China should consider imposing a ceiling on domestic copper, zinc, lead capacity to tackle cutthroat domestic competition, said the country’s main metals association.】

item.title: Globalstar 在出售过程中引起 SpaceX 的兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Globalstar 公司正在探索潜在的出售方案，并已与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司以及其他潜在的收购方进行了早期谈判。【原文：Globalstar Inc. is exploring a potential sale and has held early talks with Elon Musk’s SpaceX among other potential suitors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: General Atlantic 主导 20 亿美元的 Shutterfly 私人信贷交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，以 General Atlantic 为首的私人信用贷款公司正在洽谈向 Shutterfly 提供约 20 亿美元的债务。【原文：Private credit lenders led by General Atlantic are in talks to provide about $2 billion of debt to Shutterfly, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储资产负债表决策巩固了基金利率作为首选工具的地位
item.description: 在银行储备下降之后，美联储决定结束资产负债表的缩减，这表明官员们正在加倍努力，将联邦基金利率作为实施货币政策和帮助评估金融体系流动性的主要工具。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s decision to end its balance-sheet runoff after a drop in bank reserves suggests officials are doubling down on the federal funds rate as the primary tool to conduct monetary policy and help assess liquidity in the financial system.】

item.title: Meta 将债券销售额定为 300 亿美元，为今年最大的一次发行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在收到 1 250 亿美元的证券订单后，Meta Platforms 公司已将其公开债券销售额定为 300 亿美元。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has set its public bond sale at $30 billion, after receiving $125 billion of orders for the securities, according to people with knowledge of the transaction.】

item.title: 贝森特告诉投资者现在轮到他们拯救阿根廷了
item.description: 美国通过购买阿根廷比索获利。华尔街银行在 10 月份花了大量时间与财政部就为哈维尔-米莱筹集数十亿美元的计划进行谈判，但本周仍未取得进展。斯科特-贝森特向阿根廷投资者发出了一条信息：现在轮到你们了。【原文：The US made a profit on buying Argentine pesos. Wall Street banks, which spent a chunk of October in talks with the Treasury over a plan to line up billions for Javier Milei, haven’t moved forward this week. And Scott Bessent sent a message to Argentine investors: Now it’s your turn.】

item.title: 高盛首席执行官称，如果经济增长放缓，美国将面临债务 "倒计时
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The mounting level of US debt risks a “reckoning” for the economy if the pace of growth doesn’t improve, according to the chief executive of Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，巴菲特将年度信函交给继任者阿贝尔
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）将不再撰写伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Warren Buffett will skip writing Berkshire Hathaway Inc.’s widely read annual letter in February, handing the duty to his successor, Vice Chairman Greg Abel, according to the Wall Street Journal.】

item.title: 基金经理对诈骗哈佛同学的指控不认罪
item.description: 一名前对冲基金经理对他诈骗哈佛商学院同学和其他同事 400 多万美元的指控不认罪。【原文：A former hedge fund manager pleaded not guilty to charges that he defrauded Harvard Business School classmates and other associates of more than $4 million.】

item.title: Canva 添加新的人工智能工具并加快产品发布速度
item.description: Canva Inc.推出了新的人工智能工具，并将最近收购的公司整合到其主要产品套件中，加快了新产品的推出速度，以吸引竞争对手Adobe Inc.的用户。【原文：Canva Inc. launched new AI tools and integrated recent acquisitions into its main product suite, ramping up its speed of new rollouts as it seeks to lure users away from rival Adobe Inc.】

item.title: NBA 所有者批准以 100 亿美元将湖人队出售给马克-沃尔特
item.description: 据联盟发表的一份声明称，NBA 所有者同意马克-沃尔特以 100 亿美元从巴斯家族手中收购洛杉矶湖人队。【原文：NBA owners signed off on Mark Walter’s $10 billion purchase of the Los Angeles Lakers from the Buss family, according to a statement from the league.】

item.title: 资深策略师布莱恩-贝尔斯基（Brian Belski）离开任职 13 年的蒙特利尔银行
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的一份备忘录，长期投资策略师布莱恩-贝尔斯基（Brian Belski）已离开蒙特利尔银行资本市场（BMO Capital Markets）。【原文：Longtime investment strategist Brian Belski has left BMO Capital Markets, according to a memo seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 旅游软件公司 Navan 在 9.23 亿美元首次公开募股后下跌 12
item.description: 商务旅行和费用管理软件制造商 Navan 公司及其部分股东在首次公开募股中筹集了 9.231 亿美元，此后该公司股价暴跌 12%。【原文：Navan Inc. shares slumped 12% after the business travel and expense management software maker and some of its shareholders raised $923.1 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 欧亚资源公司与 Mercuria 公司签署 1 亿美元铜矿交易协议
item.description: Mercuria Energy Trading SA 将向欧亚资源集团提供高达 1 亿美元的预付款，作为为期三年的刚果民主共和国铜供应协议的一部分。【原文：Mercuria Energy Trading SA will provide up to $100 million in prepayments to Eurasian Resources Group as part of a three-year supply agreement for copper from Democratic Republic of Congo.】

item.title: 华尔街对人工智能成本削减的青睐令 C.H. Robinson 公司业绩飙升
item.description: 在分析师称赞 C.H. Robinson Worldwide 公司利用自动化提高利润后，该公司的股价一路飙升。【原文：The nonstop enthusiasm for artificial intelligence is spilling into the transportation business, as shares of C.H. Robinson Worldwide Inc. are on a tear after analysts praised its use of automation to boost profits.】

item.title: 德国考虑向德国电信支付更换华为设备的费用
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，德国正在考虑使用公共资金支付德国电信公司和其他电信运营商更换华为技术有限公司设备的费用。【原文：Germany is considering using public funds to pay Deutsche Telekom AG and other telecom operators to replace Huawei Technologies Co. equipment, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: MEG 以监管问题为由推迟对 Cenovus 交易的投票
item.description: MEG Energy Corp.表示，公司将推迟召开股东大会，宣布关于公司被Cenovus Energy Inc.收购的股东投票结果，理由是监管部门在最后一刻进行了调查。【原文：MEG Energy Corp. said it was delaying a meeting to announce the results of a shareholder vote on the company’s acquisition by Cenovus Energy Inc., citing a last minute regulatory inquiry.】

item.title: 英格兰又将面临一年干旱，水龙头禁令将继续实施
item.description: 英格兰将迎来又一个干旱年，创纪录的干旱天气导致水库枯竭，而即将到来的降雨量预计将远远无法满足补充全国供水的需要。【原文：England is on track for another year of drought, as record dry weather has left reservoirs depleted and upcoming rainfall is expected to fall far short of what’s needed to replenish the nation’s water supplies.】

item.title: Meta 巨型债券销售获得创纪录的 1,250 亿美元订单
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Meta Platforms 公司已收到约 1,250 亿美元的公司债券销售订单，是有史以来此类销售订单最多的一次。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has received orders of about $125 billion for a corporate bond sale, according to people with knowledge of the matter, the most ever for such an offering.】

item.title: 苏里南在寻求收益的同时出售 16 亿美元债务
item.description: 苏里南抓住投资者对高收益信贷的强劲需求，通过分两期出售美元债券重返国际债务市场。【原文：Suriname is returning to international debt markets with a two-part dollar bond sale, seizing on strong investor demand for high-yield credits.】

item.title: 费森尤斯因收费问题遭客户反弹，300 亿美元血本无归
item.description: 迈克-里昂斯（Mike Lyons）今年年初加入 Fiserv 公司时，正值这家金融科技公司股价创下历史新高。但这位新上任的顶头上司很快就发现自己正在向客户的一系列不满开火。【原文：When Mike Lyons joined Fiserv Inc. early this year, he was stepping into a fintech riding high with a record stock price. But the new top boss soon found himself firefighting a series of customer gripes.】

item.title: 美元因美联储鹰派态度反弹至八月以来最高点
item.description: 受日元走软和美联储今年不再继续降息的影响，美元汇率攀升至三个月来的最高水平。【原文：The dollar climbed to the highest level in three months, propelled by a weakening yen and the Federal Reserve pulling back from additional interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 葡萄牙今年第二次突袭调查 20 人
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，葡萄牙警方正在就诺沃银行（Novo Banco SA）的一笔房地产交易对 20 多人进行调查，这是今年涉及该银行的第二次此类调查。【原文：Portuguese police are investigating more than 20 people over a Novo Banco SA real estate deal, according to people familiar with the matter, the second such probe involving the lender this year.】

item.title: 欧盟希望美国保证不会在银行倒闭时阻止 AT1 剔除计划
item.description: 欧洲负责清算倒闭贷款机构的最高官员正在寻求美国的保证，即美国不会阻碍其他地方的监管机构在大银行倒闭时迫使债券持有人承担损失。【原文：Europe’s top official for winding down failed lenders is seeking reassurances that the US won’t stand in the way of regulators elsewhere forcing bondholders to take losses when big banks fail.】

item.title: 全球石油短缺加剧，北海石油装载量将创 8 年新高
item.description: 下个月，北海原油出口量将攀升至八年多来的最高水平，这将加剧日益严重的全球供应过剩，预计将拖累石油市场直至 2026 年。【原文：North Sea crude exports are set to climb to the highest level in more than eight years next month, adding to a growing global supply glut that’s expected to weigh on oil markets into 2026.】

item.title: Palantir 称顶级人工智能工程师为 "山寨 "公司窃取机密
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc.起诉了两名前高级人工智能工程师，称他们窃取文件和信息，帮助推出 "山寨 "竞争对手Percepta。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. sued two former senior artificial intelligence engineers, claiming they stole documents and information to help launch a “copycat” competitor, Percepta.】

item.title: 肯尼亚通胀保持稳定，降雨后通胀将有所缓解
item.description: 肯尼亚的年度通货膨胀率在 10 月份保持稳定，但随着雨季的到来，食品价格下降，预计通货膨胀率将有所缓解。【原文：Kenya’s annual inflation rate held steady in October, though it’s expected to ease as the onset of the rainy season brings down food prices.】

item.title: NBA 马刺队寻求选民批准 3.11 亿美元的球馆补贴
item.description: 本赛季，圣安东尼奥马刺队在明星球员维克托-文班亚马的带领下取得了强劲的开局。现在，球队希望将球场上的势头带到投票箱中。【原文：The San Antonio Spurs are off to a strong start this season with star player Victor Wembanyama. Now the team is hoping momentum on the court carries over to the ballot box.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行放弃加密货币疑虑，允许比特币基金进入
item.description: 北欧联合银行（Nordea Bank Abp）放弃了之前不愿接受加密货币的态度，这清楚地表明了银行业对这一曾经避之不及的资产类别的热情。【原文：Nordea Bank Abp is giving up on its previous reluctance to embrace cryptocurrencies in a clear sign how the banking industry has warmed to the once-shunned asset class.】

item.title: 借款人陷入困境，私人信贷涉足股权业务
item.description: 私人信贷公司的业务是借贷，而不是拥有。但是，随着越来越多的借款人开始陷入债务困境，贷款人开始将债务头寸换成股权，试图阻止损失。【原文：Private credit firms are in the business of lending, not owning. But as more borrowers start to struggle with their liabilities, lenders are swapping their debt positions for equity stakes to try and stem losses.】
